title: Can Someone Please Explain This Situation - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Contracts   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Maids   Marriage of Convenience   Nobles   Poor to Rich   Unreliable Narrator
author: Tsurezure Hana   徒然花
description: The poor aristocrat Viola suddenly received an unexpected marriage proposal from the prestigious noble household of Duke Physalis. An average noble daughter and the handsome duke. She had been confused, thinking that nothing made sense, but the duke had his own personal reasons. A political marriage with ulterior motives, both having their own circumstances. Will this path lead to happiness or sorrow?>
